readme:
# Monokai Neue

Monokai Neue is a color scheme that slightly modifies Monokai and adds
level-highlighting to JSON.

![monokai-neue-example](./sample.jpeg)

## License

See the [LICENSE.txt](./LICENSE.txt) file for a copy of the MIT License.

This work is based on the Monokai theme which is licensed under the MIT license
according to it's repo, but there is no copyright information to include. That
project, which was used as a starting point for this one can be found on Github
at https://github.com/kevinsawicki/monokai.

Additionally, the JSON-level highlighting used in this syntax is based, in part
on the 'atom-json-color' package which is also licensed under MIT but contains
no copyright information to reproduce here. That project can be found on Github
at https://github.com/th00ber/atom-json-color.
